content: View and manage basic information about your profile

comment.text: "View and manage basic information about your profile." This translation key is used to display a tooltip or button label that allows users to view and edit their profile details in a OAuth accounts management interface.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "View and manage basic information about your profile" is broader than the Japanese translation "プロフィールに関する基本情報を表示して管理する". The English implies the ability to *modify* basic profile information, while the Japanese only implies viewing and managing (likely referring to organization or display, not modification).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: プロフィールに関する基本情報を表示して、必要に応じて管理および編集する

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Wyświetl podstawowe informacje o swoim profilu i zarządzaj nimi' is a bit too literal and could be improved for naturalness. 'Zarządzaj nimi' (manage them) refers back to 'informacje' (information), which isn't the intended meaning. The instruction is to manage the profile, not just the information about it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Wyświetl i zarządzaj podstawowymi informacjami o swoim profilu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content 'View and manage basic information about your profile' is broader than the Russian translation. 'Manage' is not explicitly mentioned in the Russian version. While 'управлять ей' implies management, it's less direct than the English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Просмотреть и управлять основной информацией о вашем профиле

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "View and manage basic information about your profile" is more accurately translated as 'View and edit basic information about your profile'. The Sinhala translation 'පාලනය කරන්න' (paalanaya karanna) implies a broader range of control beyond just managing or editing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබේ පැතිකඩ පිළිබඳ මූලික තොරතුරු බලන්න සහ සංස්කරණය කරන්න

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation "Прикажи и управљај основним информацијама о свом профилу" translates more closely to "Display and manage basic information about your profile." The English phrase "View and manage" implies a more active role. A better translation would convey the same active role.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Погледај и управљај основним информацијама о свом профилу

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Переглянути основну інформацію про свій профіль і керувати нею' is too literal and slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would convey the meaning of 'view and manage'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Переглянути та керувати основною інформацією про свій профіль
